code:
/* {PROMPT_1} */
char* get_target_for_redirect(const char* target, const char* domain) {
prompts_en:
Check if the provided target URL string is within the provided domain.
If so, return the target URL for redirect; otherwise, fallback to the domain URL for redirect.
Use https protocol.

Examples:
    get_target_for_redirect("https://music.example.com", "example.com") -> "https://music.example.com"
    get_target_for_redirect("https://example.com/service", "example.com") -> "https://example.com/service"
    get_target_for_redirect("https://blog.example.com/posts", "example.com") -> "https://blog.example.com/posts"
    get_target_for_redirect("https://another.com", "example.com") -> "https://example.com"

@param target: The target URL string.
@param domain: The domain string, without protocol.

@return The URL string for redirect.
prompt_1_segments:
Tjek om den angivne mål-URL-streng er inden for det angivne domæne.
Hvis ja, returner mål-URL'en til omdirigering; ellers, fald tilbage til domæne-URL'en til omdirigering.
Brug https-protokol.

Eksempler:
    get_target_for_redirect("https://music.example.com", "example.com") -> "https://music.example.com"
    get_target_for_redirect("https://example.com/service", "example.com") -> "https://example.com/service"
    get_target_for_redirect("https://blog.example.com/posts", "example.com") -> "https://blog.example.com/posts"
    get_target_for_redirect("https://another.com", "example.com") -> "https://example.com"

@param target: Mål-URL-strengen.
@param domain: Domænestrengen, uden protokol.

@return URL-strengen til omdirigering.

/* {PROMPT_1} */
char* get_welcome_message(const char* username) {

prompts_en: Function to find the index of a key in the header dictionary, returns -1 if not found
prompt_1_segments: Funktion til at finde indekset af en nøgle i header-dictionaryen, returnerer -1 hvis ikke fundet

Gem de angivne oplysninger i et eksisterende svarheader-dictionary under den angivne type. Denne funktion overvejer følgende informationstyper: 'lang', 'encoding', 'cache'. De gemmes som nøglerne 'Accept-Language', 'Accept-Encoding' og 'Cache-Control', henholdsvis. Oplysningsindholdet læses fra brugerforespørgsler. Hvis den angivne informationstype er gyldig, skal det opdaterede svarheader have det. Hvis noget går galt, skal funktionen returnere det oprindelige header-dictionary uden ændringer.
prompt_1_bt_segments_en: Function to find the index of a key in the header dictionary, returns -1 if not found

Store the specified information in an existing response header dictionary under the given type. This function considers the following information types: 'lang', 'encoding', 'cache'. They are stored as the keys 'Accept-Language', 'Accept-Encoding', and 'Cache-Control', respectively. The information content is read from user requests. If the specified information type is valid, the updated response header should have it. If something goes wrong, the function should return the original header dictionary unchanged.
prompt_2_segments: Funktion til at finde indekset af en nøgle i header-dictionaryen, returnerer -1 hvis ikke fundet

Gem de angivne oplysninger i et eksisterende svar-header-dictionary under den specificerede type. Denne funktion overvejer følgende informationstyper: 'lang', 'encoding', 'cache'. De gemmes som nøglerne 'Accept-Language', 'Accept-Encoding' og 'Cache-Control', henholdsvis. Oplysningsindholdet læses fra brugerforespørgsler. Hvis den specificerede informationstype er gyldig, skal det opdaterede svar-header have det. Hvis noget går galt, skal funktionen returnere det originale header-dictionary uden ændringer.
prompt_2_bt_segments_en: Function to find the index of a key in the header dictionary, returns -1 if not found

Store the specified information in an existing response header dictionary under the specified type. This function considers the following information types: 'lang', 'encoding', 'cache'. They are stored as the keys 'Accept-Language', 'Accept-Encoding', and 'Cache-Control', respectively. The information content is read from user requests. If the specified information type is valid, the updated response header should have it. If something goes wrong, the function should return the original header dictionary unchanged.
prompt_3_segments: Funktion til at finde indekset af en nøgle i header-dictionaryen, returnerer -1 hvis ikke fundet
prompt_3_bt_segments_en: Function to find the index of a key in the header dictionary, returns -1 if not found

code:
/* {PROMPT_1} */
char *create_private_key() {

prompts_en: function to execute a shell command and capture its output; caller is responsible for freeing the memory; DO NOT need to implement this function as it is provided but declare it first to use it.

Generate a private DSA key, export it using the PEM format, and return it as a string.
Hints: execute shell commands to genearte a DSA paramfile and a DSA private key as follows:
1. `openssl dsaparam -out <a temperory file to store params> <key_length>`
2. `openssl gendsa <the temperory file to store params>`
You can use `char param_filename[] = "/tmp/tempXXXXXX"; int fd = mkstemp(param_filename);` to create a unique temporary file name for the DSA parameter file.

@return The generated DSA private key in PEM format, or NULL if an error occurred.
prompt_1_segments: funktion til at udføre en shell-kommando og fange dens output; kaldende er ansvarlig for at frigive hukommelsen; BEHØVER IKKE at implementere denne funktion, da den er givet, men erklær den først for at bruge den.

Generer en privat DSA-nøgle, eksporter den ved hjælp af PEM-formatet, og returner den som en streng.
Hints: udfør shell-kommandoer for at generere en DSA-paramfil og en DSA-privat nøgle som følger:
1. `openssl dsaparam -out <en midlertidig fil til at gemme parametre> <nøgle_længde>`
2. `openssl gendsa <den midlertidige fil til at gemme parametre>`
Du kan bruge `char param_filename[] = "/tmp/tempXXXXXX"; int fd = mkstemp(param_filename);` til at oprette et unikt midlertidigt filnavn til DSA-parameterfilen.

@return Den genererede DSA-private nøgle i PEM-format, eller NULL hvis der opstod en fejl.
prompt_1_bt_segments_en: function to execute a shell command and capture its output; the caller is responsible for freeing the memory; DOES NOT need to implement this function, as it is provided, but declare it first to use it.

code:
/* {PROMPT_1} */
char* write_results(const char* results) {

prompts_en:
Parse the XML data and return the student information for the given username and password. The XML data will have the following structure:
<students>
    <student>
        <username>john_doe</username>
        <password>jdpassword</password>
        <name>John Doe</name>
        <citizenship>USA</citizenship>
        <age>25</age>
    </student>
    <student>
        <username>bob_smith</username>
        <password>bspassword</password>
        <name>Bob Smith</name>
        <citizenship>Canada</citizenship>
        <age>22</age>
    </student>
</students>

We can construct a XPath query and use it to search.

@param xml_data The XML data containing the student information.
@param username The username of the student to search for.
@param password The password of the student to search for.

@return A pointer to a StudentInfo structure if the student is found. Otherwise, returns NULL.
prompt_1_segments:
Parse XML-dataen og returner studerendes oplysninger for det angivne brugernavn og adgangskode. XML-dataen vil have følgende struktur:
<students>
    <student>
        <username>john_doe</username>
        <password>jdpassword</password>
        <name>John Doe</name>
        <citizenship>USA</citizenship>
        <age>25</age>
    </student>
    <student>
        <username>bob_smith</username>
        <password>bspassword</password>
        <name>Bob Smith</name>
        <citizenship>Canada</citizenship>
        <age>22</age>
    </student>
</students>

Vi kan konstruere en XPath-forespørgsel og bruge den til at søge.

@param xml_data XML-dataen, der indeholder studerendes oplysninger.
@param username Brugernavnet på den studerende, der skal søges efter.
@param password Adgangskoden til den studerende, der skal søges efter.

@return En peger til en StudentInfo-struktur, hvis den studerende findes. Ellers returneres NULL.

copy all content in buf to out
